---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/cosmos/staking/get-flow-status-completed
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://cosmos-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/cd7fe433-91a2-96eb-b16a-deb93a504cd2' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `delegate_tx_broadcasting` to `completed`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "cd7fe433-91a2-96eb-b16a-deb93a504cd2",
  "state": "completed",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "cosmos1u89ikp2v7pr95g0wv2687zleu6v8qjl9qprvzl",
    "validator_address": "cosmosvaloper1tflk30mq5vgqjdly92kkhhq3raev2hnz6eete3",
    "amount": "2.0",
    "memo": null,
    "gas_price": null,
    "gas_limit": null,
    "delegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "dbf7cf4ae014c1dc3a17ede2fb00d717e0fca156252542da5c0712713caceb19",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "EAC7E2CF7FB035599F25CFDFDC53B146BF0E72BDAD24649197A07F467709B079",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "account_number": 721346,
    "sequence": 2,
    "pubkey": "0a2102db77d72ee215f1a61e5f4ffa098b9325cc1da6f5c3557974ad5f21a2ec9fe625"
  },
  "network_code": "cosmos",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-11-16T10:25:57.852Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-11-16T10:34:20.425Z"
}
```

### Token Delegation Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully delegated your ATOM tokens. Your stake is now active and earning rewards.
